about_the_game:
This is the whole soundtrack for the game World of Turtle!

Of course, you could just play the game, but I'm sure you'd want to listen to the awesome music while cruising in a car, or while riding the subway.

So here it is, all 10 songs for each stage of World of Turtle. Plus the intro music in its entirety, and the menu music.

Half of those songs were produced within one month during Jamuary 2022. The rest were songs I've composed throughout my life.

I hope you enjoy!
